ST.xhtml:
(* Check if Mqtt is initialized and if there are elements on the queue to process *) IF MqttVariables.init AND MqttVariables.fbMqttPublishQueue.CheckifMessagesAvailable() THEN
(* Loop through all free publishers untill there are no more elements in the queue or no more free publishers *) FOR i:=0 TO (MqttVariables.ipublishers-1) DO (* use the publishers that are free *) IF MqttVariables.publishers[i].SendDone THEN (* Peek a message from the queue *) itfElement := MqttVariables.fbMqttPublishQueue.PeekMessage(); xResult := __QUERYINTERFACE(itfElement, itfStringElement); IF xResult THEN sfullmessage := itfStringElement.StringValue; stopic := LEFT(sfullmessage, FIND(sfullmessage, ';') -1); spayload := RIGHT(sfullmessage, LEN(sfullmessage) - FIND(sfullmessage, ';')); MqttVariables.publishers[i].PublishMessage( Topic:= ADR(stopic), Payload:= ADR(spayload)); (* Message has been passed to a MqttPublishWorker, complete it from the queue *) MqttVariables.fbMqttPublishQueue.RemoveMessage(itfElement); ELSE (* if the result of the dequeue is FALSE then there are no more elements to process in the queue, jump out of the for loop *) EXIT; END_IF END_IF END_FOR END_IF
(* If MQTT is initialized, let the MqttPublishWorkers do their work *) IF MqttVariables.init THEN MqttVariables.MQTTClient( MQTT_INFO:= MqttVariables.MQTTInfo, MQTT_IN_OUT:= MqttVariables.MQTT_IN_OUT, ENABLE:= TRUE, URL:= MqttVariables.client, TIMEOUT:= T#1S, TLS:= FALSE);
FOR i := 0 TO (MqttVariables.ipublishers-1) DO MqttVariables.publishers[i](); END_FOR
END_IF

FB_DETECTPUSH( IN:=DigitalInput , SINGLE=> SINGLE, DOUBLE=> DOUBLE, LONG=> , TP_LONG=> LONG, T_LONG:= T#400MS);
IF FB_DETECTPUSH.SINGLE AND InitMqttDone THEN pMqttPublishQueue^.AddMessage('SINGLE', CONCAT(MQTTPublishPrefix^ ,MQTTPublishTopic), SD_MQTT.QoS.ExactlyOnce, TRUE); END_IF
IF FB_DETECTPUSH.DOUBLE AND InitMqttDone THEN pMqttPublishQueue^.AddMessage('DOUBLE', CONCAT(MQTTPublishPrefix^ ,MQTTPublishTopic), SD_MQTT.QoS.ExactlyOnce, TRUE); END_IF
IF FB_DETECTPUSH.TP_LONG AND InitMqttDone THEN pMqttPublishQueue^.AddMessage('LONG', CONCAT(MQTTPublishPrefix^ ,MQTTPublishTopic), SD_MQTT.QoS.ExactlyOnce, TRUE); END_IF

documentation.xhtml: To retain output state through powercycles
Create an array of IElements for a static queue. NOTE: The size must be 2 times larger than the maximum number of used elements.
Created a static queue. NOTE: Static created elements of this queue will be online change safe.
Factory to create StringElements on heap memory.
